entry.string: Downloads the weather.com® xml data feeds and presents your forecast.
entry.translation: Κατεβάζει τις ροές XML από το weather.com® και εμφανίζει την πρόγνωση

entry.string: Implements the guidelines defined in the weather.com® SDK.
entry.translation: Υλοποιεί τις οδηγίες που ορίζονται στο SDK του weather.com®

entry.string: You need to register at weather.com® in order to use this module. This seems like a fair trade since you will be using their feeds and they do cover the entire planet. Just follow the steps below and you should be up and running in no time.
Register for a Partner ID and License Key at
entry.translation: Εγγραφείται για Partner ID και για License Key

entry.string: You'll receive an email with your Partner ID and License Key, along with some other information.
entry.translation: Θα λάβετε ένα e-mail με το Partner ID σας και το License Key σας, μαζί με κάποιες άλλες πληροφορίες

entry.string: Enter you Partner ID and License Key into the XoapWeather Config.
entry.translation: Εισάγετε το Partner ID και το License Key στο XoapWeather Config.

entry.string: Further information on the Weather module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Weather found at
